definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树木还能保持水分防止土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: Their skins also contain many glands, which also lose water.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤也布有许多皮腺，会流失许多水分。

sentences.english: Do not think spring does not need compensatory moisture damply .
sentences.chinese: 别以为春天潮湿就不需要补充水分。

sentences.english: Moisture in the atmosphere condensed into dew during the night.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的水分在夜间凝结成露珠。

sentences.english: Humidity has a huge role. As we sweat we bring liquid to the surface of our skin.
sentences.chinese: 湿度是一个很大的原因，因排汗等于将水分带到体表。
牛皮鞋底自然灯芯水分。

sentences.english: Salt acts by the osmotic effect of extracting water from the bacterial cell fluid.
sentences.chinese: 盐能杀死细菌是利用渗透作用将细胞中的水分吸掉。

sentences.english: The average foot perspires a pint of moisture per day.
sentences.chinese: 平均脚出汗一品脱每天的水分。

sentences.english: Investigation was carried out for water penetration into moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens), grown in Fuyang, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 研究生长于浙江省富阳的毛竹的水分浸入特性。

sentences.english: Move more, let body eduction old moisture, absorb new moisture.
sentences.chinese: 多运动，让身体排出旧水分，吸收新水分。

sentences.english: Move more, let body eduction old moisture, absorb new moisture.
sentences.chinese: 多运动，让身体排出旧水分，吸收新水分。

sentences.english: Temperate rain forests get much of their water from moisture-laden ocean winds.
sentences.chinese: 温带雨林得到很多的它们的雨水从含水分的海洋风。

sentences.english: WUE of Aohan alfalfa was the highest in all alfalfa varieties.
sentences.chinese: 瞬时水分利用效率以敖汉苜蓿最高。

sentences.english: Humidity, and all kinds of liquids or moisture will erode electronic wires.
sentences.chinese: 湿气和各种液体或水分都会腐蚀电子线路。

sentences.english: The wizardly behavior of SAR is to absorb large amount of water and keep water from evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 其神奇特性在于可吸收大量的水并阻止水分蒸发。

sentences.english: The application of cereal straw increased the soil water contents.
sentences.chinese: 施用禾本科秸杆能增加土壤的水分含量。

definition: to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
